question: Which of the following is an important feature of the Panchayati Raj system of Odisha?
option1: The Chairperson is always an Woman
option2: Either the Chairperson or the Vice-Chairperson must be a woman.
option3: Half of the members must be woman
answer: Either the Chairperson or the Vice-Chairperson must be a woman.
explanation: Either the Chairperson or the Vice-Chairperson must be a woman.
